illustrator: Shinji Higuchi + Sachiko Eba/樋口真嗣 + 江場左知子
name: Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND

abilities.name: Space Virus
abilities.effect: If your opponent’s Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack of Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND, take 1 more Prize card.

attacks.name: Ozone Buster
attacks.effect: Discard all Fire Energy attached to Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND.
